#roundtime True#
{
#idx                    "'dtutc' : '%Y%m%d%H%M',"#
#timezone local#
#idx                    "'dt'    : '%Y%m%d%H%M',"#
#hum_out                "'hu'    : '%.d',"#
#temp_out               "'te'    : '%.1f',"#
#rel_pressure           "'pr'    : '%.1f',"#
#wind_dir               "'wd'    : '%.0f'," "" "winddir_degrees(x)"#
#wind_ave               "'ws'    : '%.1f',"#
#wind_gust              "'wg'    : '%.1f',"#
#calc "rain_hour(data)" "'pa'    : '%.1f',"#
}
